commandDescription: Deletes references from csv files based on input
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for xml sources. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv profiles. Default: '%s'
orgFlagDescription: Specify the alias of the org
typeFlagDescription: Specify the type of resource you want to delete. Required.
tagidFlagDescription: Specify the tagid you want to delete. Required
errorNoTypeFlag: Flag Type (-t) is required. Run 'sfdx easysources:profiles:delete -h' for examples
errorNoValidTypeFlag: Flag Type (-t) must be one of the following: ['applicationVisibilities','classAccesses','fieldPermissions','layoutAssignments','objectPermissions','pageAccesses','recordTypeVisibilities','tabVisibilities','userPermissions']
errorNoTagIdFlag: Flag TagId (-k) is required. Run 'sfdx easysources:profiles:delete -h' for examples
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
